revised_title: Earthquake of March 8 and Luminous Arch of February 16, 1749
tldr: The author, Wm. Cooper, describes his observations of the earthquake that occurred on March 8, 1749, and a luminous arch observed on February 16, 1749. He reports that the earthquake was felt in some areas but not others, and provides details on the extent of the earthquake's impact. He also describes the luminous arch, which resembled a rainbow but lacked its variety of colors, and lasted for about 20 minutes before gradually disappearing.
